languages.text: "Наладьте работу поживее, иначе будете разжалованы на нижние палубы".
"Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."
languages.original_text: "Наладьте работу поживее, иначе будете разжалованы на нижние палубы".

traits.locale_text: "Get everything working fast or you will be demoted to the lower decks."
"Get everything working fast or you will be demoted to the lower decks."
"Get everything working fast or you will be demoted to the lower decks."
"Get everything working fast or you will be demoted to the lower decks."
"Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."
"Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."

languages.text: «Hagan que todo funcione ya o les degradaré a las cubiertas inferiores».
languages.original_text: "Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: «Hagan que todo funcione ya o les degradaré a las cubiertas inferiores».

languages.text: 「今すぐ全てを動かさないと、全員、下位のデッキに降格だ」
languages.original_text: "Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: 「今すぐ全てを動かさないと、全員、下位のデッキに降格だ」

languages.text: “赶紧把机器修好，否则把你们所有人都丢到底层甲板。”
languages.original_text: "Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: “赶紧把机器修好，否则把你们所有人都丢到底层甲板。”

languages.text: "Sorgt dafür, dass alles funktioniert, und zwar plötzlich, sonst werdet Ihr degradiert und auf die Unterdecks geschickt."
languages.original_text: "Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: "Sorgt dafür, dass alles funktioniert, und zwar plötzlich, sonst werdet Ihr degradiert und auf die Unterdecks geschickt."

languages.text: « Réparez-moi ça au plus vite ou vous serez tous relégués aux ponts inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: "Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: « Réparez-moi ça au plus vite ou vous serez tous relégués aux ponts inférieurs. »

languages.text: "Bir an önce her şeyi faaliyete geçirin yoksa hepinizi alt güvertelere sürerim."
languages.original_text: "Get everything working fast or all of you will be demoted to the lower decks."
